Okay, the user is asking for healthy dinner ideas. Hmm, they didn't specify any dietary restrictions or preferences, so I should keep it general but cover a range of options. 

First, I wonder about their context. Are they a busy parent needing quick meals? A fitness enthusiast? Someone just trying to eat better? Since they didn't say, I'll assume they want simple, balanced meals that are actually doable for most people. 

I should focus on whole foods - veggies, lean
